conversation.speaker: Mood
conversation.text: Hey River, have you heard of the Night Saints guild?

conversation.speaker: River
conversation.text: Yeah, I think I've heard of it. Isn't it a group of thieves and assassins?

conversation.speaker: Mood
conversation.text: Yes, that's right. But we are not just thieves and assassins, we have a divine purpose. We are here to bring balance to the world.

conversation.speaker: River
conversation.text: Really? How do you see that?

conversation.speaker: Mood
conversation.text: We remove the corrupt and the powerful who use their wealth to control and oppress others. By doing so, we restore the balance of power and create a fairer society.

conversation.speaker: River
conversation.text: Wow, that sounds like a noble cause. How did you get involved with the Night Saints?

conversation.speaker: Mood
conversation.text: I was just like you, River. I didn't understand the true purpose of the Night Saints. But when I was given the opportunity to join, I knew it was my calling. I've never felt more fulfilled and sure of my purpose than I do now as a member of the Night Saints.

conversation.speaker: River
conversation.text: I can see how you would feel that way. It's admirable that you believe in the guild's mission so strongly.

conversation.speaker: Mood
conversation.text: Thank you, River. I believe that the Night Saints is the only way to bring about true change in this world.
